text:
Jonathan Joseph Heder (born October 26, 1977) is an American actor and producer. He is best known for his role as the title character in the movie "Napoleon Dynamite" (2004). He appeared in the movies "The Benchwarmers" (2006), "Blades of Glory" (2007) and "When in Rome" (2010). He had voice roles in the animated movies "Monster House" (2006) and "Surf's Up" (2007). He also appeared in the television series "Napoleon Dynamite" (2012), again as the title character.
Heder was born in Fort Collins, Colorado. He married Kirsten Bales in 2002. The couple have four children. He is a member of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints.
